structure.comment: Return the cdm instance (or the view of the cdm instance) as you see it.
structure.name: pipeline

structure.comment: Existing external ids for this instance, this can be used to match it to a target system. Will always send all external ids so you can use other identifiers
structure.name: externalIds

structure.comment: External ids for this instance that you want to update. By setting the value to null, you delete them.
structure.name: externalIds
